select categorykey as id,'-1' as parent_id,categoryname as name from t12_ca_programa
where (flag <> '2' or flag is null)
order by dispseq

select categorykey as id,'-1' as parent_id,categoryname as name from t12_ca_programa
where flag='1'
order by dispseq

select * from ( select t1.programakey as id,t1.categorykey as parent_id,t1.programaname as name from t12_programa t1,t12_ca_programa t2
where t1.categorykey=t2.categorykey and t1.flag='1' and t2.flag='1' and t1.auditstat='1' and t1.releasetype = '2'
order by t1.dispseq ) A union all select * from ( select categorykey as id,'-1' as parent_id,categoryname as name from t12_ca_programa
where flag='1'
order by dispseq ) B

select * from ( select t1.programakey as id,t1.categorykey as parent_id,t1.programaname as name from t12_programa t1,t12_ca_programa t2
where t1.categorykey=t2.categorykey and t1.flag='1' and t2.flag='1' and t1.auditstat='1'
order by t1.dispseq ) A union all select * from ( select categorykey as id,'-1' as parent_id,categoryname as name from t12_ca_programa
where flag='1' AND CATEGORYKEY IN (select DISTINCT CATEGORYKEY from t12_programa t1 where (flag <> '2' or flag is NULL) AND t1.AUDITSTAT = '1')
order by dispseq ) B

select * from ( select t1.programakey as id,t1.categorykey as parent_id,t1.programaname as name from t12_programa t1,t12_ca_programa t2
where t1.categorykey=t2.categorykey and t1.flag='1' and t2.flag='1' and t1.auditstat='1'
order by t1.dispseq ) A union all select * from ( select categorykey as id,'-1' as parent_id,categoryname as name from t12_ca_programa
where flag='1'
order by dispseq ) B

select t1.programakey,programaname,categorykey,showtype,isshowmoudle,releasetype,programaadd, defaultname,auditstat,t1.des,dispseq,flag,creator,createdate,modifier,modifydate,applytype, t2.isstructure,t2.iscontent,t2.issearch from t12_programa t1 left join T12_pp_programa t2 on t1.programakey = t2.programakey where (flag <> '2' or flag is null)
t1.programakey = #programakey#
programaname like '%'||#programaname#||'%'
categorykey = #categorykey#
releasetype = #releasetype#
auditstat = #auditstat#
flag = #flag#
applytype = #applytype#
order by createdate desc,dispseq
